name: Fruit Shower
effect: When you add this Disaster card to you Disaster Area, move it to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead, then look at the top 2 cards of the deck. Choose a card and add it to your hand, then discard the other.

name: One of Us
effect: When you add this Disaster card to you Disaster Area, move it to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead, then move a Hazard card in you Hazard Area to another player's Hazard Area.

name: Treasure Trove
effect: When you add this Disaster card to you Disaster Area, move it to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead, then search the discard pile for a Point card and add it to your hand.

name: Wishful Thinking
effect: When you add this Disaster card to you Disaster Area, move it to the bottom of the Disaster deck instead, then choose a player. Move that player's Dinosaur meeple backward 3 spaces on their Escape Route.
